text: Vladimir Radmanović (born November 19, 1980) is a Serbian former professional basketball player who played for the Seattle SuperSonics, Los Angeles Clippers, Los Angeles Lakers, Charlotte Bobcats, Golden State Warriors, Atlanta Hawks, and Chicago Bulls from 2001-2013. Radmanović was born on November 19, 1980 in Trebinje, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Yugoslavia.Vladimir Radmanović Biography (1980-) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:Serbian sportspeople
title: Vladimir Radmanović
